body.name: Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount No-Drill Doorbell Camera Mounting Bracket Compatible with Ring Doorbell 4/3/3 Plus/2/1/(2020 Release) Holder Accessories for Home Apartment Office Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 32 mins
features: Anti-Theft Design: This anti-theft design of the video doorbell mount bracket can fully protects your video doorbell wireless, safeguards your video doorbell camera from being stolen and secures your property.

Compatible Doorbell: Our ring doorbell mount is suitable for most video doorbell, as Video Doorbell / Video Doorbell 2 / Video Doorbell 3 / Video Doorbell 3 Plus / Video Doorbell 4 / Video Doorbell (2020 Release) and Blink Video Doorbell. The maximum size of video doorbell can be placed inside is 2.29 inch wide * 5.62 inch high * 1.26 inch thick. (Doorbell Not Included).

No-Drill Installation: Place your video doorbell into the shell of the doorbell mount bracket and fix it with sponge pads, attach the stainless steel doorbell mount holder with screws to the shell, then adjust the doorbell mount fixed clip to install the ready video doorbell mount to your home/apartment/office/rental door. No drilling is required and Easy setup.

Compatible Door: This Ring anti theft doorbell mount is suitable for most kind of Anti-theft door, inward opened door, left or right opened door (outward opened door is not suitable), The thickness of the door must be between 0.87 inches and 1.93 inches. The door gap width over 0.06 inches. Please measure your door thickness before ordering.

Package Includes: 1x anti-theft video doorbell mount, installation instructions and various installation accessories. Any problem with received products or installation, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: Anti-Theft Design: This anti-theft design of the video doorbell mount bracket can fully protects your video doorbell wireless, safeguards your video doorbell camera from being stolen and secures your property.Package Contents:Front Container Bracket (made of hard ABS material): Provides sturdy support for the video doorbell.Back Mount (made of metal): Ensures durability and stability for the installation.Sturdy Sponge: Included to securely hold the video doorbell in place inside the container. Provides additional support if needed; can be folded and cut into two pieces if necessary.Tips for Installation:Ensure Flat Door Edge: The door edge should be flat, and the door should swing inward for proper installation. Carefully check the door type before purchasing to ensure compatibility.Measure your door and doorbell size accurately before making the purchase.The video doorbell door mount is designed to prevent theft. However, note that the video doorbell itself is not included.
